description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter class 'DevicesAdapter' for displaying a list of devices, with the capability to handle connection actions via a button for each device item.

classes.name: DevicesAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying device summaries, with a click handler for connecting to devices.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for device item views, binds device data to UI elements.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Updates the list of DeviceSummary items and refreshes the RecyclerView.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder by inflating the device item layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a DeviceSummary item to a ViewHolder at a given position.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of items in the list.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds device data to the UI elements within the ViewHolder.
